programs.programDescription: Seattle Mentors provides safe, supportive environments for youth to learn, grow, and reach adulthood.
programs.activityDescription: A program that connects youth with mentors to help them navigate their personal and professional development.

programs.programDescription: Youth Employment and Service Learning (YESL) offers a wide range of service-learning and community service opportunities.
programs.activityDescription: Provides youth with opportunities for community service and employment, requiring documentation of service hours.

programs.programDescription: Teen Life Centers offer a variety of programming including special events, computer labs, and social recreation.
programs.activityDescription: Provides a safe environment for teens with various activities including Late Night Programs on weekends.

programs.programDescription: A 9-week program focusing on youth of color to introduce them to theater through workshops.
programs.activityDescription: Participants engage in performing arts workshops to develop self-discipline, confidence, and teamwork.

programs.programDescription: Community Learning Centers (CLC) provide out-of-school time programs at Seattle Public School sites.
programs.activityDescription: Offers academic and enrichment programs during and after school, serving approximately 3,300 students each year.
